text:
Hana-chan probably hasn't gotten her
money's worth from the drink bar, huh...

She doesn't drink much, so even though you
can get unlimited refills at the drink bar.

Wow, you're right. I never thought about
"getting my money's worth" before.

...Come to think of it, the drink bar seems
like a reason to chat with friends for a long time.
That's the only way I've ever seen it...

The drink bar is probably feeling lonely...
It seems like Hana-chan doesn't care about it...

...Ah, it's already been two hours...
Even though we're not done talking at all!

Yeah...! But wait a moment~!
I'm almost done with this drink...!
